The project activity is to capture methane from manure that would be released to the
atmosphere in the baseline scenario, in a swine farm. The methane is used to generate steam
in a biogas fuelled boiler in an on-site food processing facility. The project participant would
like to consider a methane destruction efficiency of 100% in the boiler. Hence on top of
monitoring the required parameters as described in Section 5 below, the project participant will
also monitor the steam output from the boiler.
